pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a static, wide-angle scenery shot of a London street scene, with no discernible subject motion. The shot is framed by a central pillar, revealing a modern sculpture on the left and the iconic Buckingham Palace with the Victoria Memorial on the right. The scene is captured during the day under a partly cloudy sky.
